problem_text_cn: 如图,⊙O的半径为2,点O到直线l的距离为3,点P是直线l上的一个动点．若PB切⊙O于点B,则PB的最小值是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the radius of ⊙O is N_0, the distance from point O to line l is N_1, and point P is a moving point on line l. If PB is tangent to ⊙O at point B, then the minimum value of PB is ()
raw_answer: 解:连结OB,作OP′⊥l于P′如图,OP′=3,∵PB切⊙O于点B,∴OB⊥PB,∴∠PBO=90°,∴PB=√{OP^{2}-OB^{2}}=√{OP^{2}-2^{2}},当点P运动到点P′的位置时,OP最小时,则PB最小,此时OP=3,∴PB的最小值为√{3^{2}-2^{2}}=√{5}．故选:B．
